abstract: A judge in Boston upheld a jury decision that Pfizer illegally promoted Neurontin for unapproved uses. Pfizer said it would appeal.
snippet: A judge in Boston upheld a jury decision that Pfizer illegally promoted Neurontin for unapproved uses. Pfizer said it would appeal.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the drug maker, has been ordered to pay a total of $142.1 million in damages for violating federal racketeering laws in the marketing of its epilepsy drug Neurontin.

headline.main: Pfizer Told to Pay $142.1 Million Over Marketing of Epilepsy Drug
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Told to Pay $142.1 Million Over Marketing of Epilepsy Drug
